Tests that console reports zero line number for scripts generated with document.write. https://bugs.webkit.org/show_bug.cgi?id=71099

document-write.html:4 Line 4
document-write.html:5 Line 5
VM:1 Line 1 in document.write
VM:4 Line 4 in document.write
document-write.html:7 Line 7
document-write.html:22 Line 22
VM:1 script element
VM:1 document.write from onload
